title: Welcome To Ashley's Arctic Fox Website

facts: Eagles, wolves and polar bears are all predators to the Arctic Fox.
Their hearing is so good that they can locate the exact position of their prey under the snow.
info.imgCaption: The natural habitat of Arctic Foxes

foxes.name: Fox in the Forest
foxes.facts: Arctic foxes have an excllent sense of smell.

foxes.name: Fox Cub
foxes.facts: Arctic fox babies are also called pups or kits.

foxes.name: Fox in the Snow
foxes.facts: Arctic foxes eat eggs. They even eat berries when they are available.

foxes.name: Fox Cubs
foxes.facts: Their fur turns gray in the spring.

foxes.name: Arctic Fox
foxes.facts: An arctic fox can survive in extremely low temperatures as low as -58 degrees!
